item.title: A public declaration of love
item.description: I am not someone who typically blogs about my personal life, and if anything, my most mentionable public displays of affection are on Facebook, where if anything, the perspectives are private. I am someone deeply driven by love. I do things because I love doing them. And most of all, because I am in love. Those who know me, especially my siblings, would know the destructive nature when my heart was crushed before, many years back.

item.title: Melayu. Who are you?
item.description: Melayu. Who are you? Bongkok atau Bebas? Radikal atau Alim? Riau atau Baku? Mundur atau Maju? Yang aku tahu, Melayu bukan satu. Kau Melayu. Aku Melayu. Tapi samakah kita? Kau pukul satu. Aku pukul dua. Tak bertemu-temu. Kerana janji Melayu. Aku Melayu sini. Kau Melayu sana. Kau belajar di Singapura, tapi tetap jiwa Alor Setar. Kau Melayu miskin. Aku Melayu fakir. Melayu kaya? Oh. Dia anak pemerintah saja. Aku Melayu terdidik.
